name: Weird Girl's Ascent
description:
Made for both the Doodle82 Mini-Jam & GMTK 2021 Jam.
The game is about a girl who died and earned her way back up to the living world again. Amazing really. Only problem is she still has to make it up the tower from hell to cross on over. Can she do it?

Tap space like crazy and you'll fly just fine. Beware the hands!
